title: Europe markets rise as investors weigh economic, geopolitical outlook; UK markets reopen

title: BHP CEO expects a turnaround in China's property sector in year ahead

title: Canada to slap 100% import tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles over 'unfair' competition
content: Canada on Monday said it is imposing a 100% tariff on China-made EV imports, as well as a 25% tariff on steel and aluminium imports from China.
